Company Role Time PeriodFree Cyber ClinicTraining Program Developer & Co-FounderOctober 2021 - NowLayout training material for fellow members to achieve their Security+ & CISSPProvide in-person & virtual training to explain how to perform computer forensics & remediate for the issues present.Create labs with virtual machines provided through Apache Guacamole that are vulnerable and need to be assessed with tools like:Task Manager, Event Viewer, Task Scheduler & File ExplorerNNSA MSIPPSecurity ResearcherOctober 2022 - Jan 2023Implement machine learning with datasets containing network data from IOT, SCADA, & ICS devices.Create my own dataset( PCAP to CSV ) with tools like:Havoc - C2 FrameworkWireshark / TCPDumpVMware Workstation Proself-made tools/programs to recreate current vulnerabilities / attacksUltimately be able to detect Advanced Persistent Threats without the need of EDR. Hi! Welcome to my website! I was previously a Security Researcher as well as a Cybersecurity Teacher. I am currently looking for full-time work in either Cybersecurity or Networking.
I currently reside in Las Vegas and work as a Training Program Developer for my non-profit (Free Cyber Clinic) where we provide training material for subjects such as OSINT, Network Security, Infrastructure, and etc in order to have our members perform assessments and remediation for small businesses. Outside of the Free Cyber Clinic I provides training and mentorship to students looking to get into cybersecurity or decide on a career.
Want to contact me? Email: angel.garcia0616@icloud.com
Download my resume
